member.name: T:Task_47.Controllers.FormsController.FilterType
member.summary:
Filter Type
0 - Modification Date
1 - Creation Date Desc
2 - Creation Date Asc
3 - Owner

member.name: M:Task_47.Controllers.FormsController.Filter(System.String,System.String,System.String,Task_47.Controllers.FormsController.FilterType)
member.remarks:
Creation Time and Modification Time format should be the following:
YYYY MM DD HH MM SS or
YYYY MM DD
the numbers should be seperated by a space

member.name: M:Task_47.Controllers.FormsController.FilterByCreationTime(System.Boolean,System.DateTime,System.Collections.Generic.List{Task_47.Controllers.FormsController.FileInfo})
member.summary: given a sort order, a date and a list of FileInfo Json objects return all the elements in the list that have a creationTime after the given creation tiem sorted in an ascending or descending order

member.name: M:Task_47.Controllers.FormsController.FilterByModificationTime(System.DateTime,System.Collections.Generic.List{Task_47.Controllers.FormsController.FileInfo})
member.summary: given a modification time and a list of FileInfo return all the elements in the list that have a been modified after the given modification time

member.name: M:Task_47.Controllers.FormsController.FilterByOwner(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{Task_47.Controllers.FormsController.FileInfo})
member.summary: given an owner and a list of FileInfo return all the elements in the list that have the same owner as the given one
